name: zebrawood
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] a kind of striped wood obtained from several different trees that grow in hot countries, used to make furniture: The accent wall in the dining room is panelled in zebrawood. It took me a year to find someone who made zebrawood furniture.
More examplesFewer examplesHe uses exotic woods such as teak, poplar, zebrawood, and mahogany.Zebrawood is a timber with a naturally stripy grain.Pieces with a zebrawood veneer are most likely to be imported from France.
